summary.span: Ospita un controllo ActiveX come elemento nel contenuto di Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

span.span: Hosts an ActiveX control as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilizzare il classe per ospitare un controllo ActiveX come un .Use the class to host an ActiveX control as a . Attualmente, il supporto Ã¨ limitato ai controlli finestra.Currently, support is limited to windowed controls.
